skins.shipDescription: Arethusa-class light cruiser ¨C Arethusa, Hull Number 26!
skins.selfIntroduction: I am the Arethusa class treaty cruiser, Arethusa: the first cruiser in the world designed with vertical armor! --Hmph! The fact that I'm amazing was decided from the beginning!
skins.acquisition: You can be at ease now that I, Arethusa, have come. If anything, Commander, don't you dare become my hindrance!
skins.login: Commander, I'm gonna get angry if you don't take this seriously!
skins.details: ...Idiot! Did no one teach you that it's rude to stare at a girl?!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Even if they are allies, I will not show mercy to any threat towards my comrades!
skins.secretaryIdle2: ...Leaving me alone like this... I-I'm not feeling lonely or anything!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hmph! You suck, Commander, so stop making me worry about you!
skins.secretaryTouch: I-it's not like I'm fond of being touched by an idiot like you! ...I just feel sorry for you since you're so lonely!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Aaah! Pervert! Molester! Lewd! Go and die!
